Name: London
Description: The capital city of the UK - known for its rich history and iconic landmarks.

Name: Edinburgh
Description: The capital city of Scotland - famous for its historic and cultural attractions.

Name: Bath
Description: A historic city known for its Roman-built baths and Georgian architecture.

Name: York
Description: A charming city with a medieval history - including York Minster and the Shambles.

Name: Oxford
Description: Home to the prestigious University of Oxford and beautiful architecture.

Name: Cambridge
Description: Famous for the University of Cambridge and picturesque punting on the River Cam.

Name: Liverpool
Description: Known for its maritime history - The Beatles, and the Albert Dock.

Name: Glasgow
Description: Scotland's largest city - known for its vibrant arts scene and architecture.

Name: Belfast
Description: The capital of Northern Ireland - with a rich history and Titanic Belfast museum.

Name: Cardiff
Description: The capital of Wales - offering historic sites and vibrant cultural experiences.

Name: Manchester
Description: A dynamic city known for its industrial heritage and thriving music scene.

Name: Birmingham
Description: England's second city - with a diverse culture and impressive architecture.
